headline: Trump angered by delays to new Air Force One planes
summary: Donald Trump is used to getting his own way. However, even he has been unable to hurry things along at troubled manufacturer Boeing, as it recently emerged that the president-elect is expected to miss out on using the new Air Force One.

headline: Trump Needs a New FAA Boss. What That Means for Musk, Boeing, Delta, and the Airlines.
summary: Tesla  CEO Elon Musk, will be closely watching who President-elect Donald Trump picks for the latest role that has come up for grabs.  The Federal Aviation Administration needs a new leader after Mike Whitaker said he would step down next month ahead of Trump’s inauguration.  Musk, who himself will co-head a new government department for efficiency, was unsuccessful in pushing for Howard Lutnick to be appointed Treasury Secretary.

raw.headline: Trump Needs a New FAA Boss. What That Means for Musk, Boeing, Delta, and the Airlines.
raw.summary: Tesla  CEO Elon Musk, will be closely watching who President-elect Donald Trump picks for the latest role that has come up for grabs.  The Federal Aviation Administration needs a new leader after Mike Whitaker said he would step down next month ahead of Trump’s inauguration.  Musk, who himself will co-head a new government department for efficiency, was unsuccessful in pushing for Howard Lutnick to be appointed Treasury Secretary.
